title: Time To Go Defensive With These ETFs
text: High-beta stocks have outperformed defensive stocks in the stock market recently, raising questions about the effectiveness of low-volatility and dividend growth investing. ROBECO's research shows that low-volatility investing can significantly improve long-term performance, particularly in market environments with increased retail investor participation. Low-risk ETFs, such as healthcare names and dividend aristocrats, offer exposure to fundamentally strong factors and tend to perform well during periods of stagflation, high inflation, and decent economic growth.
